Uses of Package
com.simple3d.math

  • Packages that use com.simple3d.math 
    Package Description
    com.simple3d.math  
    com.simple3d.math.geometry  
    com.simple3d.scene  
  • Classes in com.simple3d.math used by com.simple3d.math 
    Class and Description
    Matrix
    Interface describing operations that the Matrix classes support that are not dimension specific.
    Matrix2f
    2x2 square matrix class implemented using floats.
    Matrix3f
    3x3 square matrix class implemented using floats.
    Matrix4f
    4x4 square matrix class implemented using floats.
    MatrixOperationException
    Invalid matrix math, for example, calculating inverse of matrix when the determinant is zero.
    Quaternion
    Quaternion vector utilizing floats.
    Transform
    Transform encapsulates two Vector3f objects and a single Quaternion object, representing translation, scale, and rotation respectively.
    Vector
    Interface describing operations that the Vector classes support that are not dimension specific.
    Vector2f
    2 dimensional vector class implemented using floats.
    Vector3f
    3 dimensional vector class implemented using floats.
    Vector4f
    4 dimensional vector class implemented using floats.
  • Classes in com.simple3d.math used by com.simple3d.math.geometry 
    Class and Description
    Vector3f
    3 dimensional vector class implemented using floats.
  • Classes in com.simple3d.math used by com.simple3d.scene 
    Class and Description
    Transform
    Transform encapsulates two Vector3f objects and a single Quaternion object, representing translation, scale, and rotation respectively.
    Vector3f
    3 dimensional vector class implemented using floats.
